text: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon () is a 2000 wuxia movie directed by Ang Lee and written by Wang Hui-ling, James Schamus and Tsai Kuo Jung, based on the Chinese novel by Wang Dulu. The movie features an international cast of Chinese actors, including Chow Yun-fat, Michelle Yeoh, Zhang Ziyi and Chang Chen. == Cast == * Chow Yun-fat as Li Mu Bai * Michelle Yeoh as Yu Shu Lien * Zhang Ziyi as Jen * Chang Chen as Lo == Other websites == * Category:2000 action movies Category:2000 adventure movies Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000 fantasy movies Category:2000 romance movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:2000s American action movies Category:2000s American adventure movies Category:2000s American drama movies Category:American epic movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Chinese-language movies Category:2000s epic movies Category:Martial arts movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ang Lee Category:Screenplays by James Schamus Category:Peplum movies Category:Prequel movies Category:Taiwanese movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong adventure movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Hong Kong fantasy movies Category:Hong Kong romance movies Category:Chinese movies
title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
